oai_dc:dc.dc:description: /gipp /gipp Of Ostriches and Bushmen we have two accounts, a short one (B I. 295), and a long one which is a continuation of the myth of !kaken !kaka !aui (L II.-7. 737-797, 800-810). In the latter account, pp.780-782 treat of 'Poisoned Arrows'.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ostriches and barter
